rules_text: When this creature enters, target player separates their hand into a face-up pile and a face-down pile. Choose one of those piles, reveal it, and choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card until this creature leaves the battlefield.

When this creature enters, target opponent exiles a card from their hand. You may put that card into their graveyard. If you don't, that player reveals their hand, you choose a nonland card from it, and they discard that card. If you didn't put the exiled card into their graveyard, return it to their hand.
Or
When this creature enters, target player separates their hand into a face up pile and a face down pile. Choose one of those piles, reveal it, and choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
